column2: 18.11.3 Speedbrakes: Do not deploy the speed brakes in flight at radio?
column3: Do not deploy the speed brakes in flight at radio altitudes less than 1000 AFL

column2: 18.11.3 Speedbrakes: In flight, do not extend the speed brake lever beyond?
column3: In flight, do not extend the speed brake lever beyond the FLIGHT detent.โฒ 3RA-3VM Do not extend the speed brake lever beyo nd the ARMED detent with flaps 40 selected. Flight Instruments, Displays Home
